name: Void Cat!
description:
How to play:

You play as a cat, and your goal is to feed the cat until you've grown from size 100 to 400, as shown on the game's HUD under "Size:".

WASD or Arrows to move. To feed yourself, drag and drop enemies onto the cat. Your grab range can be increased by picking up cat treats that appear randomly on the ground when an enemy has been eaten.

Every 10 seconds, the void in the center of the screen will grow (or reappear if its been destroyed) - you die if it touches you for too long, so you must keep it from growing too large by dragging and dropping enemies onto it, which will shrink it.

You can also die by being shot at by enemies - keep your health high by picking up hearts (also dropped randomly when enemies are eaten).

Other info:

Made for Ludum Dare 51 by myself (programming, music & sfx) and cats#7175 (art).
